ARABIC: وَأَوْحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحْلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِى مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا وَمِنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ وَمِمَّا يَعْرِشُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your Lord revealed to the bees: 'Build dwellings in the mountains and the trees, and also in the structures which men erect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your Lord predisposed the bees to make their hives in mountains, trees and trellices,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Your Lord inspired the bee, saying: "Set up hives in the mountains and in the trees and in the trellises that people put up,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Your Lord inspired the bees, "Make hives in the mountains, in the trees and in the trellises,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And your Lord inspired the bee that, “Build homes in hills, and in trees, and in rooftops.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And your Lord inspired the bee, saying: "Take you habitations in the mountains and in the trees and in what they (humans) erect."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And your Lord revealed to the bee saying: Make hives in the mountains and in the trees and in what they build:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And thy Lord revealed unto the bees, saying: 'Take unto yourselves, of the mountains, houses, and of the trees, and of what they are building.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And thy Lord inspired the bee, saying: Choose thou habitations in the hills and in the trees and in that which they thatch;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your Lord inspired the bee, saying, "Make your homes in the mountains, in the trees, and also in the structures which men erect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thy Lord inspired the bee saying: take thou for thyself of the mountains houses and of the trees and of that which they erect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And your Lord inspired the bee [saying]: ‘Make your home in the mountains, and on the trees and the trellises that they erect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And thy Lord taught the Bee to build its cells in hills, on trees, and in (men's) habitations;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And your Lord inspired the bee, saying: "Take you habitations in the mountains and in the trees and in what they erect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your Lord revealed to the bee: 'Build your homes in the mountains, in the trees, and in what they are building.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And your Lord inspired the bee: “Set up hives in the mountains, and in the trees, and in what they construct.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And your Lord inspired to the bee, "Take for yourself among the mountains, houses, and among the trees and [in] that which they construct.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:68] And your Lord revealed to the bee, a revealing [effected] through inspiration, [saying] (an, ‘that’, is either explicative or relates to the verbal noun): ‘Choose among the hills habitations, to which you can resort, and among the trees, [also] habitations, and among the trellises which they raise, that is, the places which humans build for you — for otherwise it [the bee] would not resort to these [places].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And thy Lord inspired the bee, saying: Choose thou habitations in the hills and in the trees and in that which they thatch) and in that which they build;
